document_data.caption: A map of the Neverwinter Wood depicting Neverwinter River's tributaries.
document_data.name: Gibdraw
document_data.mainbody: '''The Gibdraw''' was the northeastern tributary of the [[Neverwinter River]], located in the heart of the [[Neverwinter Wood]].
document_data.Description: The Gibdraw was a small two-prong waterway that began in Neverwinter Wood and trickled northeast to merge into the Neverwinter River.
